title: Google\Cloud\Firestore\V1\StructuredQuery\CollectionSelector
name: CollectionSelector
description:
A selection of a collection, such as messages as m1.

Generated from protobuf message google.firestore.v1.StructuredQuery.CollectionSelector

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.collection_id
params.description: The collection ID. When set, selects only collections with this ID.

params.name: data.all_descendants
params.description: When false, selects only collections that are immediate children of the parent specified in the containing RunQueryRequest. When true, selects all descendant collections.

methods.name: getCollectionId
methods.description:
The collection ID.

When set, selects only collections with this ID.
